translations: vt.再次分类；再次评分；重新分级；使降级；将（路面）坡度减缓（regrade 的过去式和过去分词）
vi.倒退（regrade 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Note that the whole exam will be regraded.
sentences.translation: 注意，整个考试会被重新评分。

sentences.sentence: Theeggs were then subjected to the negative pressure/imaging system and regraded.
sentences.translation: 这些鸡蛋然后经过负压/成像系统处理，重新评定。

sentences.sentence: Artifical improvement of soil fertility in a regraded forest ecosystem by using municipal sewage sludge.
sentences.translation: 城市污泥对退化森林生态系统土壤的人工熟化研究。
